content: I am an passionate agricultural economist and a Ph.D. candidate at University of California, Davis. My research interests lies in the intersection of agricultural policy and rural development, with a special focus on the organization of modern agricultural supply chains. I am now working under the guidance of Prof. Richard J. Sexton<\a> and Prof. Rachael E. Goodhue<\a>.
summary: I am an passionate agricultural economist and a Ph.D. candidate at University of California, Davis. My research interests lies in the intersection of agricultural policy and rural development, with a special focus on the organization of modern agricultural supply chains.
title: Yujing(Megan) Song
